job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` else exit 1; endif setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes starver .DEV2 set file = muons_R${rung}_${f}_${l} echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${file}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; set out = ${file}.event.root set tagFile = ${file}.root set fitter = ",KFVertex,StiCA"; #,HLTCA" set ddir = `pwd` set case = `basename $ddir`; echo "case = $case"; echo $case | grep PPV # if (! $?) set fitter = ",VFPPVnoCTB,Sti"; # if (! $?) set fitter = ",VFPPVnoCTB,StiCA"; echo "fitter $fitter" set tagFile = ${file}.root # ZF # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"MC.2016a,StiCA,-hitfilt,KFVertex,StiHftC,geantOut,vmc,20MuonsFlatpT3GeV,VMCAlignment,sdt20160319.060000,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,-useXgeom,rung.'${rung}${fitter}',noRunco,noHistos",0,"'${out}'","'${tagFile}'")' >& ${logFile} # RF # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"MC.2016a,StiCA,-hitfilt,KFVertex,StiHftC,geantOut,vmc,20MuonsFlatpT3GeV,VMCAlignment,sdt20160301,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,-useXgeom,rung.'${rung}${fitter}',noRunco,noHistos",0,"'${out}'","'${tagFile}'")' >& ${logFile} endif # RF Ideal root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"MC.2016a,StiCA,-hitfilt,KFVertex,StiHftC,geantOut,vmc,20MuonsFlatpT3GeV,ReverseField,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,-useXgeom,rung.'${rung}${fitter}',noRunco,noHistos",0,"'${out}'","'${tagFile}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
